@rose_mary_jane @FrkJohansen No, read Desperation and maybe The Regulators, but not that one.
@jenjenbyrd I'm off to bed. Let me know how you are doing later.xx
@jenjenbyrd he's blocked your wheelchair? wtf? I'm sorry this is happening. Can you see someone else?
@jenjenbyrd I know, it makes everything worse. Just hang in there! We'll get through this! xx
@jenjenbyrd I know mine doesn't take me seriously either. It's a nightmare that we have to be in this situation! The research will help soon
@jenjenbyrd what do you plan to do re the GET?
@jenjenbyrd I'm sorry, that's maddening. I know the whole replay thing, it happens to me too. I hope you can settle down and rest.
@jenjenbyrd not according to our new College of Physicians guidelines-no opiates for fibro..
@jenjenbyrd he's cutting off pain meds because of new provincial guidelines, not because of anything I did. No opiates unless u have cancer.
@jenjenbyrd I'm so ill that it takes me a week to recover physically from appt-when he treats me like that, it's like PTSD too
@jenjenbyrd told me to push myself, talks down to me, just no support whatsoever, the opposite..
@jenjenbyrd it was a few things-he doesn't even realize what ME is. I'm bedridden, severe-he says I have fibro. Cut off my pain meds (T3s)..
